Package etomica.molecule.iterator

Interface MoleculesetIteratorBasisDependent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AtomsetIterator, MoleculesetIterator, MoleculesetIteratorTargetable

    public interface MoleculesetIteratorBasisDependent
extends MoleculesetIteratorTargetable
    Interface for an MoleculeIterator that can be conditioned with target and basis molecules.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int basisSize​()
      Indicates the size of the basis needed to set the iterator.
      boolean haveTarget​(IMolecule target)
      Returns true if the iterator with its current basis would return an iterate for the given target.
      void setBasis​(IMoleculeList molecules)

    • Method Detail

      • setBasis

        void setBasis​(IMoleculeList molecules)

      • basisSize

        int basisSize​()
        Indicates the size of the basis needed to set the iterator. The length of the array given to setBasis should be this value.
        Returns:
        the size of the basis for this iterator.

      • haveTarget

        boolean haveTarget​(IMolecule target)
        Returns true if the iterator with its current basis would return an iterate for the given target.
